body_html: BTW, I observed 85 T ops/second with CUDA 9 on float16 matmul/V100 using Nvidia's NGC TensorFlow container (as opposed to 8.8 T ops/s on my GTX 1080 at home). Really looking forward to having these improvements in the officially supported version!
body_text: BTW, I observed 85 T ops/second with CUDA 9 on float16 matmul/V100 using Nvidia's NGC TensorFlow container (as opposed to 8.8 T ops/s on my GTX 1080 at home). Really looking forward to having these improvements in the officially supported version!
body:
BTW, I [observed](https://medium.com/@yaroslavvb/peak-performance-of-amazon-p3-instances-f2bc48f9ef71) 85 T ops/second with CUDA 9 on float16 matmul/V100 using Nvidia's [NGC](https://ngc.nvidia.com/signin/email
) TensorFlow container (as opposed to 8.8 T ops/s on my GTX 1080 at home). Really looking forward to having these improvements in the officially supported version!
